titleStmt.title: Confidence questioned: or, A brief examination of some doctrines delivered by M. Thomas Willes of Bottolphs Billings-Gate, in a sermon preached by him at Margrets New-Fish-Street, the 7th of Decemb. 1657. Also, some questions touching his pretended call and authority to preach the Gospel. By Jeremiah Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

titleStmt.title: Confidence questioned: or, A brief examination of some doctrines delivered by M. Thomas Willes of Bottolphs Billings-Gate, in a sermon preached by him at Margrets New-Fish-Street, the 7th of Decemb. 1657. Also, some questions touching his pretended call and authority to preach the Gospel. By Jeremiah Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Daniel White, and are to be sold at the seven Stars in Paul's Church-yard; or are to be had at the author's house in Red-Cross-Street,

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in December 1657.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
